channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ME
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ME

item.title: Report E-2024090175
item.description:
Report E-2024090175

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-13T09:14:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-21
  • City: SACO
  • State: ME
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: WHILE UNLOADING FREIGHT FROM TRAILER MATERIAL HANDLER DISCOVERED A PAIL THAT HAD BEEN SLIGHTLY PUNCTURED BY FREIGHT LOADED BEHIND IT AND PUSHED INTO IT. SPILLED MATERIAL WAS CLEANED WITH ABSORBENT AND PLACED INTO A RECOVERY CONTAINER AS WAS THE PUNCTURED PAIL.
